name: Buddy and I
description:
Short puzzle game in which you have to cooperate with an AI controlled robot to beat the level.

How to play

The player can possess a robot by interacting with the computer. The player has to cooperate with the robot to beat the level. The robot can step on pressure plates and press buttons to open doors. The player cannot pass through green barriers and the robot cannot pass through blue barriers.

Controls

W, A, S, D - Move

E - Interact With Computer  / Press Button

LMB - Leave Marker 

RMB - Pick Up / Drop Object
